meanings.definition: A large quantity or number of something.
meanings.sent1: The store had an admasses of toys for sale.
meanings.sent2: The admasses of books in the library made it a great place to study.
meanings.sent3: The admasses of candy at the party tempted everyone to indulge.
meanings.sent4: The admasses of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The admasses of colorful balloons at the fair created a festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To gather or accumulate in a mass.
meanings.sent1: She tried to admasses all her courage before the big presentation.
meanings.sent2: The workers began to admasses the fallen leaves in the garden.
meanings.sent3: He decided to admasses his thoughts before making a decision.
